titleStmt.title: Lachrimae sive valedictio Scotiae sub discessum clarissimi, prudentissimi, & pientissimi Gubernaotris [sic] Domini Georgii Monachi in Angliam revocati authore Gulielmo Moorehead ... = : The tears and valediction of Scotland upon the departing of her Governour, the Lord Generall George Monck, and Londons welcome reception of His excellencie for being instrumentall in the bringing home our Gracious Soveraign Lord King Charles the Second.
titleStmt.author: Moorhead, William, d. 1691.

titleStmt.title: Lachrimae sive valedictio Scotiae sub discessum clarissimi, prudentissimi, & pientissimi Gubernaotris [sic] Domini Georgii Monachi in Angliam revocati authore Gulielmo Moorehead ... = : The tears and valediction of Scotland upon the departing of her Governour, the Lord Generall George Monck, and Londons welcome reception of His excellencie for being instrumentall in the bringing home our Gracious Soveraign Lord King Charles the Second.
titleStmt.author: Moorhead, William, d. 1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H. Brugis ... for the author,

notesStmt.note: Added t.p. without address of printer in imprint and with "Gubernatoris" in title.
Opposite pages numbered in duplicate with parallel English and Latin text.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
